cards.rules_text:
[i]Eminence[/i] — Whenever you sacrifice a creature, if Bradius, Hell Carver is in the command zone or on the battlefield, you may exile it from your graveyard and put a skull counter on it.
When Bradius enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, Bradius deals damage equal to that creatures power to each opponent.
[i]Skullkeeping[/i] — Minotaur you control have double strike as long as you own four or more cards in exile with skull counters on them.

When you cast Gruvak, God of Horns, search your library for up to two Minotaur creature cards with different names, and put them onto the battlefield.
[i]Skullkeeping[/i] — Whenever one or more creatures you control attack a player, you may exile a card from your graveyard and put a skull counter on it. If you do, the defending player discards a card.

Haste
Whenever Syseus attacks, you may sacrifice an artifact or another creature. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Syseus.
Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Partner with Kaltagar, Dungeon Keeper [i](When this creature enters, target player may put Kaltagar into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]

First strike
{2}, {T}, Discard a card: You may cast an artifact or creature card from your graveyard until end of turn.
Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, Kaltagar deals 2 damage to any target.
Partner with Syseus, Dungeon Clearer [i](When this creature enters, target player may put Syseus into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]

[i]Skullkeeping[/i] — Destroy each creature with power less than the number of cards you own in exile with skull counters on them.
Madness {2}{B}{B} [i](If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

Attacking creatures you control get +2/+0.
{1}{R}, Discard a card: Create a 2/3 red Minotaur Warrior creature token.

Exile target card from your graveyard and put a skull counter on it. Gain life equal to its mana value.
[i]Skullkeeping[/i] — If you own two or more cards in exile with skull counters on them, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

Minotaur spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
Discard a card: Creatures you control gain haste until end of turn.
Madness {B}{R} [i](If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

First strike
When Fury Captain enters the battlefield, create two 2/3 red Minotaur Warrior creature tokens.
Other Minotaur you control get +1/+1 and have first strike.

Whenever you discard a creature or enchantment card, you may exile it. If you do, you may cast it. If you don't cast the exiled card, put a skull counter on it and each opponent loses 1 life.
Cycling {W}{B} [i]({W}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)[/i]

Trample
Sacrifice Captured Minotaur: Add {R}{R}.
Madness {R} [i](If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

Other Minotaur you control have deathtouch.
Whenever one or more creature cards are put into a players graveyard from anywhere, draw a card. This ability only triggers once per turn per player.

Training [i](Whenever this creature attacks with another creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]
When One Horned Trainee dies, exile target creature you don't control with lesser power than One Horned Trainee.

Menace
When Bloodsoaked Berserker deals combat damage to a player, untap it and each other attacking creature. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.
Bloodsoaked Berserker can't attack players it dealt combat damage to this turn.
[i]Skullkeeping[/i] — As long as you own four or more cards in exile with skull counter it, attacking creatures you control have lifelink.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature.
Exile target permanent. Its controller creates two Treasure tokens. If you sacrificed a creature to cast this spell, your opponents can't cast spells this turn.

Whenever you discard a card, you may exile it from your graveyard and put a skull counter on it.
{1}, {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
[i]Skullkeeping[/i] — {3}{B}{R}, Sacrifice Horned Totem: Discard your hand and draw X cards, where X is the number of cards you own in exile with a skull counter on it.

Mentor [i](Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)[/i]
Whenever a nontoken creature you control with a counter on it dies, create a 2/3 red Minotaur Warrior creature token.
[i]Skullkeeping[/i] — Oathbound Cleaver can't be blocked by creatures with power less than the number of cards you own in exile with a skull counter on it. [i](Cares about how many cards you own in exile with skull counters on them.)[/i]

Pay 1 life, {T}: Add {R}, {W}, or {B}.
Madness {1} [i](If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

cards.special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I — Create two 2/3 red Minotaur Warrior creature tokens.
II — You may discard up to three cards, then draw that many cards.
III — Creatures you control gain menace until end of turn.

I — Mill five cards. Then exile a card from your graveyard and put a skull counter on it.
II — Each opponent sacrifices the creature with the greatest mana value they control.
III — Each opponent puts a creature card of their choice from their graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a Minotaur in addition to its other types.

I — Search your library for a land card. Reveal it and put it into your hand. Gain 2 life.
II — Whenever you attack this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on the attacking creature with the greatest power.
III — You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, gain life equal to its power.

Target creature you control gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn. Whenever that creature deals combat damage a player this turn, exile that many cards from the top of your library. You may play those cards until the end of your next turn. Put a skull counter on each card exiled this way.

When Suncleaver Minotaur enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a nontoken creature or enchantment.

Target creature you control gets +X/+0 and gains trample until end of turn. You may have that creature fight another target creature. If that creature would be dealt excess damage, create that many tapped Treasure tokens. [i](Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)[/i]
